articles.content:
A Call of Duty squad has shattered a Warzone record by managing to eliminate almost every other player in a single match.
Details of the record were shared by pro player Priestahh, who is currently signed to the FaZe Call of Duty squad. You can check out his… [+1904 chars]

articles.title: Here's The New 300bhp VW Golf GTI Clubsport Looking Sharp At The 'Ring - Car Throttle
articles.description: The more focused version of the Golf 8 GTI has been spotted undergoing testing at the Nurburgring
articles.content:
The Golf 8 GTI hasnt even been launched yet, and VW is already working on a hotter version. Thats the kind of keenness we can get on board with. 
A prototype GTI Clubsport - successor to the TCR -has been spotted hammering around the Nurburgring Nordschleife… [+1645 chars]

articles.title: You can now transfer your Google Play Music library to YouTube Music - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Play Music will be shut down by Google later this year.
articles.content:
Play Music will shut down later this year and to make the transition to YouTube Music easier, Google has announced a new tool that lets Play Music users transfer their libraries to YouTube Music.
The migrated data will include uploaded and purchased songs, a… [+860 chars]

articles.title: Sadly, 111 in this story isn't binary. It's decimal. It's the number of security fixes emitted by Microsoft this week - The Register
articles.description: Nothing too scary. Plus updates from SAP, Adobe, VMware
articles.content:
The May edition of Patch Tuesday landed this week. And there are scores of security fixes to install.
A total of 111 fixes were released by Microsoft, though on the bright side none are being actively exploited, as far as we know. Sixteen earned Microsoft's … [+3253 chars]

articles.title: If this rumour is true, there's really bad news for Samsung Galaxy Note fans - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG is believed to be hard at work on the next Galaxy flagship, but the latest offering from the South Korean firm could be missing one huge feature we've already seen on other Galaxy smartphones launched this year.
articles.content:
Earlier this week Ross Young, the founder and CEO of DSCC, tweeted: "No Galaxy Note Ultra model, but the Galaxy Fold 2 will be your Ultra. #GalaxyNote".
Young also added: "Note 20+ will grow from 6.8" to 6.87", resolution will increase to 3096 x 1444 resulti… [+1073 chars]
